name: photo-watermark2
description: Cross-platform desktop app to add text/image watermarks to photos

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n vite,app -c auto "vite --host --port 5173 --strictPort" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron . --dev"
scripts.dev:5174: concurrently -k -n vite,app -c auto "vite --host --port 5174 --strictPort" "wait-on http://localhost:5174 && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5174 electron . --dev"
